mapper.select: select t1.*, t4.image, t5.remark remarkStr, t6.name typeName, t7.name childTypeName from inno72_check_fault t1 left join inno72_machine t2 on t1.machine_id=t2.id left join inno72_check_user_machine t3 on t2.id=t3.machine_id left join inno72_check_fault_image t4 on t1.id=t4.fault_id left join inno72_check_fault_remark t5 on t1.id=t5.fault_id left join inno72_check_fault_type t6 on t1.type=t6.code left join inno72_check_fault_type t7 on t1.type = t7.parent_code where t1.id = #{faultId}
